articles.author: By Melissa Macaya, Meg Wagner, Mike Hayes, Veronica Rocha and Fernando Alfonso III, CNN
articles.title: Live updates: Biden to pick VP for 2020 election ballot
articles.description: Joe Biden, the presumptive Democratic nominee, is expected to announce his running mate for the 2020 election ballot. Follow here for the latest.

articles.author: Jeff Zeleny, Senior Washington Correspondent
articles.title: Joe Biden selects his running mate with announcement coming as early as Tuesday
articles.description: Joe Biden has selected his running mate, revealing to top advisers on Tuesday the woman he will invite to join his ticket, two people familiar with the matter tell CNN.

articles.author: Kevin Liptak, CNN
articles.title: Trump says Americans will have to 'learn Chinese' if Biden wins but offers little condemnation of Beijing
articles.description: In a pair of interviews on Tuesday, President Donald Trump railed against his competitor for being weak on China -- but stopped short himself of condemning China's repression of its Uyghur ethnic minority or its crackdown on political freedoms in Hong Kong.

articles.title: What Joe Biden says he is looking for in his VP pick - CNN Video
articles.description: Democratic presumptive nominee Joe Biden describes what he's looking for in a vice president and why he and President Barack Obama were so close.

articles.author: Analysis by Chris Cillizza, CNN Editor-at-large
articles.title: This 2020 nightmare scenario is looking more and more likely
articles.description: Only 84 days until the 2020 presidential election!

articles.title: Trump vs Biden on climate change - CNN Video
articles.description: President Donald Trump has expressed doubt over the reasons for climate change while Joe Biden has called it an "existential threat."

articles.author: Analysis by Stephen Collinson with Caitlin Hu, CNN
articles.title: Analysis: Trump, satire, and Europe's 'last dictator'

articles.author: Ellie Kaufman, CNN
articles.title: Postmarks come under scrutiny as states prepare for mail-in voting
articles.description: States are bracing for controversy as they work to ensure that Postal Service postmarks and other tracking will back efforts to prove mail-in votes are sent on time. They're seeking to avoid lawsuits and other issues about unclear markings that have dogged some primaries and could mar ballot counts come Election Day.

articles.author: Christina Maxouris, CNN
articles.title: This 21-year-old thought he had overcome a mild case of Covid-19. Then he went into organ failure
articles.description: Spencer Rollyson says he didn't think much of it when he experienced mild coronavirus symptoms in May. Weeks later, the disease almost took his life.

articles.author: By Joshua Berlinger, Adam Renton, Melissa Macaya, Meg Wagner and Mike Hayes, CNN
articles.title: Coronavirus update: Latest news from around the world
articles.description: The coronavirus pandemic has brought countries to a standstill. In many places, as countries reopen, Covid-19 cases are on the rise. Follow here for the latest.
